block.p: AMERICAN LEAGUE BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Activated C Willie Morales from the 15-day disabled list and optioned him to Rochester of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Placed 1B Tony Clark on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Gabe Alvarez from Toledo of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Activated RHP Kevin Appier from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned 2B Frank Menechino to Sacramento of the PCL. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Optioned LHP Jim Morris to Durham of the International League. Recalled OF Quinton McCracken from Durham. Designated INF Tony Graffanino for assignment. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Activated OF Shannon Stewart from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned OF Andy Thompson to Syracuse of the International League.

NATIONAL LEAGUE COLORADO ROCKIES--Placed OF Larry Walker on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of OF Bubba Carpenter from Colorado Springs of the PCL. FLORIDA MARLINS--Placed 3B Mike Lowell on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Chris Clapinski from Calgary of the PCL. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed RHP Jim Bruske on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of RHP Hector Ramirez from Indianapolis of the International League. NEW YORK METS--Placed OF Rickey Henderson on waivers for the purpose of giving him his unconditional release. Purchased the contract of 1B Mark Johnson from Norfolk of the International League. Placed INF-OF Melvin Mora on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF-OF Joe McEwing from Norfolk of the International League. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Optioned LHP Brian O'Connor to Altoona of the Eastern League.

NATIONAL BASKETBALL ASSOCIATION NBA--Suspended Philadelphia F-C Matt Geiger two games and fined him $20,000 and Indiana G Reggie Miller one game and fined him $5,000 for their altercation during Saturday's game.
COLLEGE BOSTON COLLEGE--Named Nigel Bentley women's tennis coach. NEW MEXICO STATE--Extended the contract of Tony Samuel, football coach, through 2004.
